articles.title: Russia’s Luna-25 enters lunar orbit, joins Chandrayaan-3 around Moon - India Today
articles.description: Luna-25 is Russia's first moon mission since Luna-24 in 1976, when it was still a part of the Soviet Union.
articles.content:
Russia's lunar lander Luna-25 entered the circular polar orbit around the Moon on Wednesday and became its artificial satellite.
